subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: DaMarcus Beasley is expected to become the 13th player to appear 100 times for the United States soccer team when it faces Belgium in Cleveland on Wednesday.
snippet: DaMarcus Beasley is expected to become the 13th player to appear 100 times for the United States soccer team when it faces Belgium in Cleveland on Wednesday.
